Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://helloworld.garethahealy.com" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://helloworld.garethahealy.com" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <!--Type definitions for input- and output parameters for webservice--> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://helloworld.garethahealy.com"> <xs:element name="helloWorldRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hello"/> > </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="helloWorldResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element type="xs:string" name="goodbye"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--Message definitions for input and output--> <wsdl:message name="helloWorldRequest"> <wsdl:part name="in" element="tns:helloWorldRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="helloWorldResponse"> <wsdl:part name="out" element="tns:helloWorldResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--Port (interface) definitions--> <wsdl:portType name="HelloWorldEndpoint"> <wsdl:operation name="SayHello"> <wsdl:input message="tns:helloWorldRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:helloWorldResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--Port bindings to transports and encoding - HTTP, document literal encoding is used--> <wsdl:binding name="HelloWorldBinding" type="tns:HelloWorldEndpoint"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="SayHello"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://helloworld.garethahealy.com/SayHello" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body parts="in" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body parts="out" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--Service definition--> <wsdl:service name="HelloWorldEndpointService"> <wsdl:port name="HelloWorldEndpoint" binding="tns:HelloWorldBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:9001/cxf/helloWorldService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 2
